name: Dinner Party Chicken Breasts
ingredients: 1 tsp each seasoned salt, salt, paprika
instructions: Mash garlic and mix with sour cream, lemon juice and seasonings.
Coat  chicken with sour cream mix.
Cover and refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Remove chicken and roll in bread crumbs.
Bake at 350 for 50 minutes or until chicken is golden brown.
